title: Best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G power banks
description: Charge your Samsung Galaxy A55 anytime with these power banks. The post Best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G power banks appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Charge your Samsung Galaxy A55 anytime with these power banks.
text: The Samsung Galaxy A55 is a smartphone that not only offers a big display but also a big battery. Its 5,000mAh battery can easily last for a day under moderate usage. However, if you are staring at the low battery notification, its 25W fast charging support is there to save the day. The only issue is you may not have a fast charger or wall socket nearby to avail those fast charging speeds. This probability increases when you are on the go. It is the reason we suggest you get a power bank aka a portable charger. This is a charger which is convenient to carry around and can be used to charge the phone whenever required. Check out these best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G power banks. Sale UGREEN 25,000mAh Power Bank This is a 25,000mAh capacity power bank from UGREEN. It has dual USB-C ports (45W and 100W) and a USB-A port (18W). It has an LED display that shows the current battery level. It supports USB PD 3.0 fast charging technology. Sale Baseus 30,000mAh Portable Charger This is a massive 30,000mAh power bank that needs to recharge only once and will last for days. It has dual USB-A ports and a USB-C port which can also be used for input with a peak output of 22.5W. It has a microUSB input port as well. Display shows current battery percentage and an icon if the connected device supports fast charging. Sale Anker PowerCore 24,000mAh Power Bank This is a 24,000mAh power bank featuring dual USB-C ports and a USB-A port. One of the USB-C ports is also meant for recharging the power bank. It can deliver a maximum output of 140W. Its smart digital display shows battery percentage, time to recharge, and output through each port. Sale Baseus 20,000mAh Power Bank This power bank features 20,000mAh capacity and a total of four ports. It has a USB-C input/output port (65W), a microUSB input port (18W), and dual USB output ports (30W). Its display shows the remaining battery, charging voltage, and charging current. Available in Black and Blue color options. Sale Miady 10,000mAh Power Bank (2-pack) You get two 10,000mAh power banks with this bundle. It has two USB ports and a USB Type-C port. It is quite compact and lightweight which makes it convenient to carry. It comes with a USB cable but no lightning cable. Choose from six color combinations. Anker PowerCore Slim 10,000mAh Power Bank This is a slim power bank with just 0.6-inch thickness. It has a USB-C port that can deliver up to 20W fast charging and a USB-A port that can go up to 12W. You can charge two devices together. The package comes with a USB-A to USB-A and a USB-A to USB-C cable. Available in Black, White, Blue, and Green colors. Sale INIU 10,000mAh Power Bank This is the power bank to get if you are looking for a slim and affordable product. It has a 10,000mAh capacity and a single USB-C port that supports both input and output. The only thing to note is its maximum charging speed is 15W. Available in five different colors. Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice. html:
The Samsung Galaxy A55 is a smartphone that not only offers a big display but also a big battery. Its 5,000mAh battery can easily last for a day under moderate usage. However, if you are staring at the low battery notification, its 25W fast charging support is there to save the day.

The only issue is you may not have a fast charger or wall socket nearby to avail those fast charging speeds. This probability increases when you are on the go. It is the reason we suggest you get a power bank aka a portable charger. This is a charger which is convenient to carry around and can be used to charge the phone whenever required. Check out these best Samsung Galaxy A55 5G power banks.

Sale

UGREEN 25,000mAh Power Bank

This is a 25,000mAh capacity power bank from UGREEN. It has dual USB-C ports (45W and 100W) and a USB-A port (18W). It has an LED display that shows the current battery level. It supports USB PD 3.0 fast charging technology.

Sale

Baseus 30,000mAh Portable Charger

This is a massive 30,000mAh power bank that needs to recharge only once and will last for days. It has dual USB-A ports and a USB-C port which can also be used for input with a peak output of 22.5W. It has a microUSB input port as well. Display shows current battery percentage and an icon if the connected device supports fast charging.

Sale

Anker PowerCore 24,000mAh Power Bank

This is a 24,000mAh power bank featuring dual USB-C ports and a USB-A port. One of the USB-C ports is also meant for recharging the power bank. It can deliver a maximum output of 140W. Its smart digital display shows battery percentage, time to recharge, and output through each port.

Sale

Baseus 20,000mAh Power Bank

This power bank features 20,000mAh capacity and a total of four ports. It has a USB-C input/output port (65W), a microUSB input port (18W), and dual USB output ports (30W). Its display shows the remaining battery, charging voltage, and charging current. Available in Black and Blue color options.

Sale

Miady 10,000mAh Power Bank (2-pack)

You get two 10,000mAh power banks with this bundle. It has two USB ports and a USB Type-C port. It is quite compact and lightweight which makes it convenient to carry. It comes with a USB cable but no lightning cable. Choose from six color combinations.

Anker PowerCore Slim 10,000mAh Power Bank

This is a slim power bank with just 0.6-inch thickness. It has a USB-C port that can deliver up to 20W fast charging and a USB-A port that can go up to 12W. You can charge two devices together. The package comes with a USB-A to USB-A and a USB-A to USB-C cable. Available in Black, White, Blue, and Green colors.

Sale

INIU 10,000mAh Power Bank

This is the power bank to get if you are looking for a slim and affordable product. It has a 10,000mAh capacity and a single USB-C port that supports both input and output. The only thing to note is its maximum charging speed is 15W. Available in five different colors.

Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice.
